entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI adorner layer displays adorners in wrong place #4675
  • Controls/Layout does not draw controls correctly in first-time view. #4672
  • [Android] Grid child is not visualized if there is another child on top of it that is not visible #4671
  • Acces to unique ID of the device #4670
  • [Webview] event unload never called #4669
  • [Webview] height 0 when we inspect with google chrome #4667
  • Partial methods not compiling in MAUI Class Libraries #4666
  • Cannot change Android package bundle #4660
  • [Bug] Frame CornerRadius Not working properly when Margin is setup to minus value (push to top) #4656

Closed

  • Parent was reset when StackLayoutManager.Measure was invoked #3970
  • [Windows] CarouselView not rendering #3460
  • Validate MenuItem API is complete for Desktop MacCatalyst/WinUI #1715
    6.0.200-preview.12
  • Shell FlyoutHeader at the wrong position in WinUI #3879

PullRequests

Created

  • Blazor Windows Open Links in Browser with Configurability #4680
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Scoping doc #4679
  • Add ExecutionPolicy and NoProfile to powershell command #4678
  • [Android] Fix the math for GenerateAdornerOffset #4677
    partner/ui-tools
  • Interfaced BorderHandler and CheckBoxHandler #4676
  • Refactor Share to use an interface #4674
  • Refactor SemanticScreenReader to use an interface #4673
  • Refactor SecureStorage into an interface #4668
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Implement Padding property in ImageButtonHandler #4665
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Implement LineBreakMode property in ButtonHandler #4664
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Essentials.MediaPicker refactored to interface and singleton #4663
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.OrientationSensor refactored to interface and singleton #4662
    area/essentials 🍞

Merged

  • Fix cell parenting when using Retain Caching #4636
    area/ListView
  • [Windows] CarouselViewHandler #4200
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Add pending events in EntryHandler #4347
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [ci] Provisionator channel as a parameter on the pipeline #4620
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4643
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • product name / terminology corrections #4661
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [WinUI] Fix Flyout Background Color and Locked Flyout Margins #4639
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • Renaming public APIs Native --> Platform #4599
    area/architecture
  • Refactor Accelerometer into an interface #4630
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Implement image caching functionality for iOS #4515
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Essentials.Compass refactored to interface and singleton #4615
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Connectivity refactored to interface and singleton #4622
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [iOS] Replace UIDevice.CheckSystemVersion checks #4635
    platform/iOS 🍎
  • Essentials.Barometer refactored to interface and singleton #4604
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Workload targets improvements (#1611) 2.0 #2011
    do-not-merge, area/setup 🪄
  • Update Android Gallery to use Maui #1558
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Essentials.Clipboard refactored to interface and singleton #4612
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Allow to use string to define StrokeShape in XAML #3256
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️
  • Remove IToolbar from IStackNavigationView #4654
  • Essentials.Email refactored to interface and singleton #4623
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Battery refactored to interface and singleton #4629
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Gyroscope refactored to interface and singleton #4649
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Blazor Android Open Links in Browser with Configurability #4645
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Adding UWP-compatibility to ProgressBar #4653
    area/controls 🎮
  • Essentials.FileSystem WIP refactored to interface and singleton #4633
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [X] Identify Setter property target in VSG case #4607
  • Remove Material Visual marker #4428
  • [tests] Add Task.Delay to some unreliable tests #4637
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Essentials.Accelerometer refactored to interface and singleton #4644
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.HapticFeedback refactored to interface and singleton #4651
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Magnetometer refactored to interface and singleton #4652
    area/essentials 🍞
